rules_master.changelog: Added point costs and balance metadata for Faction Builder tool

balance_engine.rounding_rule: Always round UP to nearest 5 points

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.effect: Deploy Hidden. Reveal at any time to gain First Strike in melee against the first target.

first_strike.name: First Strike
first_strike.effect: +1 die to the first melee attack made this round (or when revealing from Hidden).

scout.name: Scout
scout.effect: Make a free Move after all forces deploy but before the first activation.

out_of_nowhere.name: Out of Nowhere
out_of_nowhere.effect: Instead of activating normally, this unit may spawn from sand, ruins, or rubble terrain.

climber.name: Climber
climber.effect: Ignores vertical movement penalties. Cannot move through Impassable terrain.

runner.name: Runner
runner.effect: If no attacks are made during activation, make an additional Move at the end.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.effect: Enemies shooting from 9"+ suffer -1 to hit.

flying.name: Flying
flying.effect: Ignores terrain while moving. Cannot be targeted by melee unless attacker also has Flying.

leaper.name: Leaper
leaper.effect: May leap 2d6" ignoring terrain. On double 1s, lose this ability and take 1 damage.

boardwalk_blitzer.name: Boardwalk Blitzer
boardwalk_blitzer.effect: Moves at double speed on boardwalks. After moving on boardwalk, may take one additional action.

barely_controlled.name: Barely Controlled
barely_controlled.effect: Must move 6" at start of activation or pass Quality test to avoid Crash Landing.

impact.name: Impact
impact.effect: Moving 3"+ into contact deals 1 automatic hit before rolling attack dice.

brutal_impact.name: Brutal Impact
brutal_impact.effect: Moving 3"+ into contact deals 2 automatic hits before rolling attack dice.

savage_impact.name: Savage Impact
savage_impact.effect: Moving 3"+ into contact deals 3 automatic hits before rolling attack dice.

blast.name: Blast
blast.effect: 3" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model.

massive_blast.name: Massive Blast
massive_blast.effect: 6" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model.

venom.name: Venom
venom.effect: After dealing damage in melee, target suffers 1 additional damage at end of its next activation.

pinning_shot.name: Pinning Shot
pinning_shot.effect: On hit, target cannot move during its next activation.

hex.name: Hex
hex.effect: On successful hit, target suffers -1 Quality until end of its next activation.

grapple.name: Grapple
grapple.effect: On hit, pull target 3" toward this unit. Target cannot move next activation.

hell_spray.name: Hell Spray
hell_spray.effect: Three times per game, unleash 12"x12" cone attack. All units in cone are targeted.

demolition.name: Demolition
demolition.effect: Deals double damage to structures and terrain features.

tough.name: Tough
tough.effect: When taking damage, roll 1 die per point. Each 5+ ignores 1 damage.

tougher.name: Tougher
tougher.effect: When taking damage, roll 2 dice per point. Each 5+ ignores 1 damage.

toughest.name: Toughest
toughest.effect: When taking damage, roll 3 dice per point. Each 5+ ignores 1 damage.

armored.name: Armored
armored.effect: Reduce damage taken by 1 (minimum 0). Does not affect terrain/environmental damage.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.effect: Once per activation, cancel 1 Success from an incoming attack.

shield_wall.name: Shield Wall
shield_wall.effect: +1 Defense while adjacent to another Shield Wall model.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.effect: At start of activation, heal 1 wound on a 5+.

grit.name: Grit
grit.effect: Once per game: When reduced to 0 Quality, reduce to 1 instead.

fear.name: Fear
fear.effect: Enemies within 6" suffer -1 die on Morale tests.

terror.name: Terror
terror.effect: When enemy first engages, they must test Morale or become Shaken.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.effect: Ignores Fear, Terror, and Dread. Still tests Morale for Damage and Terrain.

inspire.name: Inspire
inspire.effect: Friendly units within 6" gain +1 to Morale checks.

rally.name: Rally
rally.effect: Once per round, remove Shaken from friendly within 6"; they gain +1 die on next Morale test.

repair.name: Repair
repair.effect: If this unit has Spare Parts, restore 1 damage to adjacent friendly vehicle/device/mechanical unit.

befriend_beast.name: Befriend Beast
befriend_beast.effect: May attempt Befriend against living monsters. Make opposed Quality check.

befriend_kaiju.name: Befriend Kaiju
befriend_kaiju.effect: May attempt Befriend against Titan-class Kaiju. Success calms or redirects rampage.

assistant.name: Assistant
assistant.effect: May assist adjacent Mystic or Scientist with special activations.

melee.name: Melee
melee.effect: Can be used in close combat. Does not require Line of Sight.

grapple.name: Grapple
grapple.effect: On hit, pull target 3" toward this unit.

pinning_shot.name: Pinning Shot
pinning_shot.effect: Target hit may not move next activation.

grunt.name: Grunt
grunt.type_rule: Expendable Fodder: No VP granted. Cannot control objectives.

brute.name: Brute
brute.type_rule: Momentum: After dealing melee damage, move 2" (no reactions).

mystic.name: Mystic
mystic.type_rule: Lingering Harm: Debuffs persist until end of target's next activation.

shooter.name: Shooter
shooter.type_rule: Fire Superiority: Split dice between 2 targets if stationary.

cavalry.name: Cavalry
cavalry.type_rule: Disengage: Leave melee without penalty after attacking.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.type_rule: First Strike: Attack first when charging or charged.

tank.name: Tank
tank.type_rule: Bodyguard: Intercept attacks for adjacent friendly units.

leader.name: Leader
leader.type_rule: Rally + Command Presence: Morale auras and Quality sharing.

titan.name: Titan
titan.type_rule: Unstoppable: Ignore difficult terrain. Cannot be Grappled by smaller units.
